item.title: Morgan Stanley notes another threat to the market besides rates and gives stocks that are immune
item.description: Stocks with lower sensitivity to a stronger dollar and exposure to foreign sales could outperform going forward, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: The Nasdaq has dropped 4% over the past week. Here's why that may not be a big red flag
item.description: Tax considerations and a shift away from tech are two possible reasons why the weakness in the Nasdaq is not a bad omen for the stock market.

item.title: Jefferies sees more upside for these 2 AI chip stocks over Nvidia
item.description: These two semiconductor stocks could see more significant gains than Nvidia in the new year, according to Jefferies.

item.title: A way to play a potential market bounce with options
item.description: Nishant Pant describes a bull call spread in the Materials Select Sector SPDR fund.

item.title: Deutsche Bank sees shares of the 'Chinese Waymo' rallying 40% this year
item.description: Autonomous driving company Pony AI could see large-scale growth ahead for its robotaxis, according to Deutsche Bank.
